review.reviewBody: Really good nigiri as well as fried chicken karaage was awesome!

Everything was good and I thought they did a really good job with the the Tako Wasabi and the Salmon Oshi   These really stood out.  I liked the addition of the side-seaweed to the Tako and the flavors were spot on for both of these dishes.

Not gonna lie..
This store food was absolutely good..
And 100% worth it 
The best food i ever had in DD
This might be the best meal I've ever had on DD.

The BEST !  It tastes just like I'm in Japan again!

Took care in all things including condiments.

Presentation and taste is SAIKO!
